main event: A single white disc-shaped object with a blue tint was observed, appearing as a flash of light in Boise, Idaho on 5 January 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as having a blue tail., Only one object was reported., The observation type was ground-visual., The object traveled in a straight course., The report contains comments indicating the lack of sufficient data for a conclusive evaluation.
sighted object: one white disc-shaped object with blue tint
witness description: local newspaper and a filter center in Boise, Idaho were referenced for information
